import React from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' function List({ type, movies }) { return (
{movies && movies.length > 0 ? ( movies.map((el) => (

{el.original_title}

 {console.log(` ${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/assets/${el.poster_path.substring(1)}`)}
)) ) : (

There are no movies yet!

)}
) } export default List
